Package org.jetel.util.file

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CustomPathResolver
    This class is intended to be implemented by third party applications.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CredentialsSerializingHandler
    This handler was so as openConnection() method can be handled by the platform default url handler and the handler can provide proper url serialization to string (which fails on Weblogic).
    FileMessages  
    FileURLParser
    Helper class with some useful methods regarding file string manipulation
    FileUtils
    Helper class with some useful methods regarding file manipulation
    FileUtils.ArchiveURLStreamHandler  
    SandboxUrlUtils
    Utility class for working with sandbox URLs.
    SMBPathResolver
    Adds read/write support for Windows shares (SMB/CIFS protocol, UNC paths).
    TrueZipVFSEntries
    This class registers all archives managed by TrueZip library for a single graph instance.
    URLConnectionRequest  
    WcardPattern  
    ZipUtils
    Class for gzip compression/decompression.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    SMBPathResolver.SMBException
    Because jcifs.smb.SmbException never contains info about what URL was handled when error occurred, this class is used to wrap any jcifs.smb.SmbException thrown and contains culprit URL in its message.
